channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Traffic Collision; INC#1573; 09:11PM; 858 S Hope St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3zi7m9b; #DowntownLA; A two-vehicle traffic collision at the end of a police pursuit resulted in 4 injured being transported by LAFD to the hospital (none were officers). No one was trapped. Unknown ages/genders/conditions/affiliations. Animal Services was notified to assist a canine on scene. Nothing further.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 E10 E210 EM1 EM11 RA10 RA11 RA209 RA810 RA811 RA9 RA900 T10; CH4; 13; Nicholas Prange

Update Mudslide; INC#0378; 11:00AM; 9450 W Hidden Valley Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3M8O25I; #BeverlyCrest; Building and Safety arrived on scene to assess the structures and possible risk. The mudflow has now stopped and officials determined no evacuations are needed, as the homes were not directly in the path of the flow and only the driveways have been impacted/blocked. No injuries. No evacuations. LAFD has now cleared the scene.; FS 108; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 5; BC14 E108 E97 UA6 UR88; CH8; 18; Nicholas Prange

Mudslide; INC#0378; 08:12AM; 9450 W Hidden Valley Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3M8O25I; #BeverlyCrest; LAFD on scene of a mudslide affecting approximately one-quarter acre and blocking at least two residential driveways. Building and Safety and a Geologist will be assessing the situation, which will determine whether it is safe for the residents of the affected homes to remain there. No reported injuries.; FS 108; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 5; BC14 E108 UR88; CH8; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0722; 12:28PM; 4063 S Nicolet Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/40m2Y4N; #BaldwinHills/#Crenshaw; It took 20 firefighters 15 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish flames in one second-floor unit of a three-story garden-style apartment building. The fire appeared to have been started by (or near) the oven, but did not extend beyond the kitchen. No reported injuries.; FS 94; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC13 BC18 E294 E34 E94 RA68 RA894 T94; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0722; 12:13PM; 4063 S Nicolet Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/40m2Y4N; #BaldwinHills/#Crenshaw; Three-story garden style apartment building with smoke showing from the second floor. Offensive mode.; FS 94; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC13 BC18 E294 E34 E94 RA68 RA894 T94; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Brush Fire; INC#1722; 09:57PM; 974 N Mayo St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JOAERx; #MountWashington; Firefighters quickly extinguished a row of at least 6 Cypress trees before any nearby homes were damaged. There was no extension into the brush, and no structures damaged. No reported injuries. The cause of the fire is unknown.; FS 55; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC2 E1 E201 E212 E250 E42 E44 E55 E90 EM1 H3 H4 H5 HA3 HA4 HA5 T1 T12 T50; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Brush Fire; INC#1722; 09:41PM; 974 N Mayo St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JOAERx; #MountWashington; PRELIM: Row of Cypress trees are on fire adjacent to a single family home.; FS 55; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC2 E1 E201 E212 E250 E42 E44 E55 E90 EM1 H3 H4 H5 HA3 HA4 HA5 T1 T12 T50; CH5; 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1569; 07:58PM; 5930 W Pico Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3npFgWV; #MidCity; Firefighters located a grease fire in the fast food kitchen creating large amounts of smoke. It took 20 firefighters just 12 minutes to eliminate the flames. Firefighters will set up blowers to systematically force the smoke out and reintroduce fresh air into the structure. No reported injuries.; FS 58; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC18 E261 E61 E68 RA68 RA858 T61; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1569; 07:46PM; 5930 W Pico Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3npFgWV; #MidCity; One-story commercial building with moderate smoke showing. Offensive mode.; FS 58; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC18 E261 E61 E68 RA68 RA858 T61; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1164; 03:49PM; 1228 S Flower St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3lKgsIC; #DowntownLA; LAFD's first arriving firefighters ascended ladders to the roof to find the source of the heavy smoke, which was burning rubbish atop the one-story commercial building. Firefighters quickly extinguished the rooftop contents fire, without allowing flames to penetrate down into the building. It took 21 firefighters 15 minutes from the time of alarm to complete the task. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 E10 E203 E209 E9 RA13 RA26 SQ21 T10 T3 T9; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange
